description:
Coach Bananya has trained up champions in many sports. When the legendary coach sees hidden potential in him, Bananya starts practicing various sports. Then the day of the big tournament comes, and Bananya must face an array of champions!
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Sports no Ouza o Mezashite, Nya!
Strive to Be the King of Sports, Nya!
スポーツのおうざをめざして, にゃ!
